articles.author: ABC News
articles.title: Argentine President Alberto Fernandez accused of racism after saying Brazilians 'came from the jungle' - ABC News
articles.description: Argentine President Alberto Fernandez triggers a Twitter storm and a regional race debate with misjudged comments seeking to play up the South American country's ties with Europe.
articles.content:
Argentine President Alberto Fernandez has triggered a Twitter storm and a regional race debate with misjudged comments seeking to play up the South American country's ties with Europe.

articles.author: Fox News Staff
articles.title: Stephen Miller calls out Joy Reid for defense of Harris' refusal to visit border - Fox News
articles.description: America First Legal founder Stephen Miller slammed MSNBC's Joy Reid's statements defending Vice President Kamala Harris for not going to the southern border during her trip this week on “Fox News Primetime” Wednesday.

articles.author: Sky
articles.title: COVID-19: America to give 500 million Pfizer coronavirus jabs to poorer countries - Sky News
articles.description: Mr Biden is expected to confirm the donation on Thursday in an effort to close the gap and fight so-called "vaccine apartheid".
